main_features.description: Automated scraping of EU call for tenders from the official website, including pagination and data extraction.
Management of PostgreSQL database using SQLAlchemy ORM, ensuring efficient storage and retrieval of call data.
A responsive dashboard for monitoring system status, scraping statistics, and convocatoria results with real-time updates.

technical_stack: aiohttp (for asynchronous HTTP requests in scraping)

corrective_actions.solution: Import the 'TEXT' type from SQLAlchemy in the models.py file.
